COMMAND.name: exit
COMMAND.help: Save log facility configuration changes and exit current mode.

COMMAND.name: cancel
COMMAND.help: Roll back log Facility configuration changes.

COMMAND.name: level_options_set
COMMAND.help: Set level options. This command can be run multiple times in this view to set different level options.

PARAM.name: level
PARAM.help: Level identifier.

PARAM.name: level_options
PARAM.help: Logging level options.

PARAM.name: enable
PARAM.help: Enable/Disable this logging option.

COMMAND.ACTION:
lua local fld = nil local levelFld = nil local set = 0
if ("${level}" == "Emergency") then levelFld = "emergency" elseif ("${level}" == "Alert") then levelFld = "alert" elseif ("${level}" == "Critical") then levelFld = "critical" elseif ("${level}" == "Error") then levelFld = "error" elseif ("${level}" == "Warning") then levelFld = "warning" elseif ("${level}" == "Notification") then levelFld = "notice" elseif ("${level}" == "Information") then levelFld = "information" elseif ("${level}" == "Debugging") then levelFld = "debug" end
if ("${level_options}" == "Display_In_Event_Log") then fld = "logConfig." .. levelFld .. "1" elseif ("${level_options}" == "Send_to_syslog") then fld = "logConfig." .. levelFld .. "3" elseif ("${level_options}" == "Display_on_telnet" or "${level_options}" == "Display_on_SSH_monitor") then fld = "logConfig." .. levelFld .. "4" end
clishCfgObjAdd ("logFacility", fld, "${enable}")

COMMAND.name: exit
COMMAND.help: Save remote logging configuration changes and exit current mode.

COMMAND.name: cancel
COMMAND.help: Roll back remote logging configuration changes.

COMMAND.name: log_identifier
COMMAND.help: Set the log identifier prefixed to both, e-mail and Syslog messages.

PARAM.name: identifier
PARAM.help: Log identifier string.

COMMAND.name: email_logs_enable
COMMAND.help: Set whether or not system emails scheduled logs.

PARAM.name: enabled
PARAM.help: Email logs enabled or disabled.

COMMAND.name: email_server
COMMAND.help: Set options for emailing of logs.

PARAM.name: ip_address
PARAM.help: IP Address or internet name of an SMTP server.

COMMAND.name: smtp_port
COMMAND.help: The SMTP port of the e-mail server.

PARAM.name: smtpPort
PARAM.help: The SMTP port of the e-mail server.

COMMAND.name: return_email_address
COMMAND.help: Set email address SMTP server replies are sent.

PARAM.name: email
PARAM.help: Return email address.

COMMAND.name: send_to_email_address
COMMAND.help: Set email address where logs and alerts will be sent.

PARAM.name: email
PARAM.help: Send to email address.

COMMAND.name: send_to_email_address2
COMMAND.help: Set email address where logs and alerts will be sent.

PARAM.name: email2
PARAM.help: Send to email address.

COMMAND.name: send_to_email_address3
COMMAND.help: Set email address where logs and alerts will be sent.

PARAM.name: email3
PARAM.help: Send to email address.

PARAM.name: smtp_auth
PARAM.help: SMTP authentication types.

COMMAND.name: smtp_auth username
COMMAND.help: Set SMTP authentication username (for plain and CRAM-MD5 auth).

PARAM.name: username
PARAM.help: Username for SMTP authentication.

COMMAND.name: smtp_auth password
COMMAND.help: Set SMTP authentication password (for plain and CRAM-MD5 auth).

PARAM.name: password
PARAM.help: Password for SMTP authentication.

COMMAND.name: Tls_Enable
COMMAND.help: Enable Tls support (for plain and CRAM-MD5 auth).

PARAM.name: tlsSupport
PARAM.help: Enable Tls support (for plain and CRAM-MD5 auth).

COMMAND.name: identd_from_smtp_server_enable
COMMAND.help: Enable/Diable to identd from smtp server.

PARAM.name: identdSmtp
PARAM.help: Enable/Disable identd from smtp server.

COMMAND.name: schedule
COMMAND.help: Set schedule for sending log by email.

PARAM.name: unit
PARAM.help: Schedule unit.

PARAM.name: day
PARAM.help: Schedule day. Required only if unit is 'daily'.

PARAM.name: time
PARAM.help: Schedule time. Required only if unit is 'daily' or 'weekly'.

PARAM.name: meridiem
PARAM.help: Time in A.M. or P.M. Required only if unit is 'daily' or 'weekly'.
